name: RELOAD (itch) (Sir Conflexe)
description:
*** WELCOME TO THE SIMULATION ***

RELOAD is a short, bossfighting platformer game. Fight, learn patterns, get defeated, upgrade, repeat. Are you up for the challenge?

Good luck, and Have fun :)

UPDATES

1.1 - Corrected music bug

1.2 - Improved Keyboard controls

CREDITS

Made with Gamemaker Studio 2

Music from https://www.zapsplat.com

Sound effects from https://kenney.nl/

Additionnal sound effects from https://99sounds.org/
